"Then"said the femme with aq whisper"Some how you're one of us=

  ----- Original Message -----

  Doc: Hold it, Salveo! You say that Maximals and Predacons are the
  re=
spective descendants of Autobots and Decepticons!?! Look then.

  He showed=
 his shoulder. It was still muddy from the rainstorm he had
  arrived in. H=
e took a cloth and started wiping the dirt off. Soon, he
  revealed a brigh=
t red Autobot insignia.

  He smiled at the others.
